definition: the roof of the world/usually refers to Tibet or Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau 青藏高原[Qing1 Zang4 gao1 yuan2]

sentences.english: The ice fields at the roof of the world are shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 这世界屋脊的冰原也在渐渐消融。

sentences.english: The ridge runs diagonal across the roof being a consequence of the different gables and front dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 不同的侧面尺寸及山墙使屋面屋脊形成对角状。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, his past exploits are making their way to the rooftop of the world.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，他过去的英勇事迹也正在进入世界屋脊。

sentences.english: The naughty boy was sitting astride of the house-roof.
sentences.chinese: 那个顽皮的男孩跨坐在屋脊上。

sentences.english: I sound my barbaric yawp over the rooftops of the world.
sentences.chinese: “站在世界屋脊上，我喊出我野性的狂叫”。

sentences.english: World roof Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, the Northeast Plain, MA Hirakawa.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原世屋脊，东北平原马平川。

sentences.english: High bar debt and ridge type tent use this kind of to prop up a method.
sentences.chinese: 单杆帐和屋脊型帐篷使用这种支撑方法。

sentences.english: The facades are 21 metres high, rising to 24 metres at the ridge.
sentences.chinese: 它的正面高二十一米，到屋脊高度为二十四米。

sentences.english: Wamao is one of the animal-like ridge-decorations on the traditional buildings of Yunnan Province of China.
sentences.chinese: 瓦猫是云南民居建筑上使用广泛的屋脊兽。

sentences.english: I knew a girl in Marysville who could walk the 11)ridgepole of a roof.
sentences.chinese: 在梅利斯维尔有一个女生可以在屋脊上走呢。

sentences.english: Hongyuan is located in the east border of Qingzang plateau which is called"global ridge".
sentences.chinese: 红原地处“世界屋脊”青藏高原东部边缘。

sentences.english: Nestled in the Himalayas, bordering the world's highest peak, Mount Everest, lies tiny landlocked Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰雄踞世界屋脊喜马拉雅山颠。

definition: interlocking wooden brackets between the top of a column and crossbeams used in traditional Chinese architecture
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
